titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Morris Fishbein Letter to Dr. H. Sinclair Taite, 1922 RL.11505
titlestmt.author: Alice Poffinberger

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-09-08 16:40:36 -0400.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Morris Fishbein letter to Dr. H. Sinclair Taite
did.abstract: Collection comprises a letter (1922 October 27) Morris Fishbein wrote to Dr. H. Sinclair Taite regarding the purchase and shipment of volumes of the Bulletin of the Society of Medical History of Chicago.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Dr. Morris Fishbein was an editor for the American Medical Association Journal and an health columnist.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Morris Fishbein Letter to Dr. H. Sinclair Taite was received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2017.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Morris Fishbein Letter to Dr. H. Sinclair Taite, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2017-0140

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection comprises a letter (1922 October 27) Morris Fishbein wrote to Dr. H. Sinclair Taite regarding the purchase and shipment of volumes of the Bulletin of the Society of Medical History of Chicago. Acquired as part of the History of Medicine Collections.
